attributes.action: ease traffic congestion by banning cars making journeys between the hours of 5am and 9pm
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In order to ease congestion introduce a law whereby it is an offence for a car to make a non commerical related journey. This should be in force from 5.00am - 9.00pm during the week and all Saturdays, Sundays and Bank Holidays.
